{{{

library(ChainLadder)
GenIns
source("http://chainladder.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/R/ChainLadder.R")
CL <- ChainLadder(GenIns)
n <- ncol(GenIns)
## predict the model
CL.predict <- lapply(CL$Models, predict)

do.call("cbind", lapply(, function(x) {
    if(length(x)==(n-1)){
        x
    }else{
        c(x,rep(NA, 9-length(x)))
    }
}
                        )
        )

}}}
